name: Zombies Ate my Buy One Get One 50%-Off Coupon
name_original: Zombies Ate my Buy One Get One 50%-Off Coupon
description:
How to play:

Press the left mouse button to swing your axe.

Press the right mouse button to fire a laser, or hold the right mouse button and release to charge a more powerful laser.

Be sure to check out customers, or they'll get upset after waiting for too long and you'll get deducted points!
